attributes.action: hold a public enquiry before any proposals site store gas under Gainsborough, Lincolnshire are accepted.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There have been recently announced proposals for Gas to be stored in the depleted oil field at Gainsborough.  We believe the risks posed outweigh the benefits of storing gas this way.  There is a local population of 35,000 in Lincs and Notts who are directly affected.  We seek a public enquiry before any more background work can be undertaken.
